about: Hi, I'm Jake. I'm an engineer, blogger, and aspiring startup founder. I like to learn about the world and solve hard problems to make life better for people. I have a background in robotics and web development, and right now I'm especially interested in nuclear fusion, cultivated meat, and carbon removal.
Iâ€™m currently working on getting a new job, starting my blog, and a bunch of other side projects. If you're interested in my work or there's something I can help with, please reach out!
hire: I'm currently looking for work, either full time or freelance! I'm most experienced as a software developer and have also done a bunch of work with electronics and hardware. My strongest languages are C++ and Python, and lately I've been working with JavaScript and lots of frontend and backend web dev tools.
I learn quickly and love to take on new challenges. If you're looking for an all-purpose problem solver who can tackle complex technical problems, I can help!
